assetRequirements.purpose: to capture the essence of autumn in Turkey and attract travel enthusiasts
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant autumn colors with scenic views of Turkish landscapes
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the beauty of Antalya, Bodrum, and Cappadocia during the autumn season

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight specific attractions and experiences available in Turkey this autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: picturesque imagery of beaches, gastronomy, and cultural tours
assetRequirements.content_context: focusing on the unique offerings of Turkey during the autumn season

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Турции!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
